name: NiXPiX
description:
The adventures of little cat looking for colors to decorate this gray boring world

Controls:  Q , W to move, P to jump

This is my first game.  Inspired by my gray colored days. My main target - release something. I'm trying to hard and to long without results. Cant take any project to finish but this.

Thank to my wife, pushing me to the end =)

Im open to any questions and feedbacks (sorry for my b4d englizh)

And... this is just a first step, to be continued...
